page.title: 14Railway Station
page.content: To find out about the railway station we interviewd the Station Master's Assitant.He told us the first train arrived at 5:07a.m. & that 5 full-time railmen are employed at the station.There is a booking clerk,2 leading railmen,1 general porter & 2 signal men.The leading railmen worked 7 hours & 48minutes each day & sometimes worked overtime.He gave us some sample fares from Newtown.To Shrewsbury(child/return)75p. To Aberystwyth(child/return)Â£2.00. To London(special saver/child)Â£7.00 Approximatly 150 passengers a day use the station.14 trains pass through the station every day in the summer. Railmen wear a special uniform whitch is navy and blue with red stripes.The station master has gold stripes on his hat & jacket.The training begins at 16 years of age.
